cms.query.QueryText: SELECT TOP 1 SiteID, SiteDomainName as 'SiteDomainAliasName' FROM CMS_Site WHERE SiteID != @SiteID AND SiteStatus = 'RUNNING' AND ( SiteDomainName=@DomainName OR SiteDomainName=@DomainName+':80' OR SiteDomainName IN ( SELECT SiteDomainAliasName FROM CMS_SiteDomainAlias WHERE SiteID=@SiteID UNION ALL SELECT SiteDomainAliasName + ':80' FROM CMS_SiteDomainAlias WHERE SiteID=@SiteID ) ) UNION ALL SELECT TOP 1 CMS_SiteDomainAlias.SiteID, CMS_SiteDomainAlias.SiteDomainAliasName FROM CMS_SiteDomainAlias LEFT JOIN CMS_Site ON CMS_Site.SiteID = CMS_SiteDomainAlias.SiteID WHERE CMS_SiteDomainAlias.SiteID != @SiteID AND SiteStatus = 'RUNNING' AND ( SiteDomainAliasName=@DomainName OR SiteDomainAliasName=@DomainName+':80' OR SiteDomainAliasName IN ( SELECT SiteDomainAliasName FROM CMS_SiteDomainAlias WHERE SiteID=@SiteID UNION ALL SELECT SiteDomainAliasName + ':80' FROM CMS_SiteDomainAlias WHERE SiteID=@SiteID ) )
